articles.author: Gabriella Borter, Makini Brice
articles.title: Some U.S. Black pastors, key players in COVID education, are hesitating to push vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: When a major healthcare organization asked A.R. Bernard, the Black head of a Brooklyn megachurch, to sit on a committee tasked with boosting acceptance of COVID-19 vaccines in communities of color in New York City, he demurred.
